feed.title: Sault Ste. Marie - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Sault Ste. Marie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:25 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -6.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 05:14 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -6.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -7.2°C
Wind: E 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow late this morning and this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this morning. Wind becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 late this morning. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
